mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_ITEM_PROP ( ORDER_CODE, ORDER_ITEM_CODE, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_GROUP, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_KEY, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_VALUE, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_OPTION, CREATE_AUTHOR, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_AUTHOR, UPDATE_DATETIME ) VALUES ( #{orderCode}, #{orderItemCode}, #{orderItemPropGroup}, #{orderItemPropKey}, #{orderItemPropValue}, #{orderItemPropOption}, #{createAuthor}, current_timestamp(), #{updateAuthor}, current_timestamp() )
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDER_ITEM_PROP SET ORDER_ITEM_CODE = #{orderItemCode}, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_GROUP = #{orderItemPropGroup}, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_KEY = #{orderItemPropKey}, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_VALUE = #{orderItemPropValue}, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_OPTION = #{orderItemPropOption}, CREATE_AUTHOR = #{createAuthor}, CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime}, UPDATE_AUTHOR = #{updateAuthor}, UPDATE_DATETIME = current_timestamp() WHERE UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime} AND ORDER_CODE = #{orderCode} AND UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime}
mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_CODE AS "orderCode", ORDER_ITEM_CODE AS "orderItemCode", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_GROUP AS "orderItemPropGroup", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_KEY AS "orderItemPropKey", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_VALUE AS "orderItemPropValue", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_OPTION AS "orderItemPropOption", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM ORDER_ITEM_PROP WHERE ORDER_CODE = #{orderCode}

SELECT ORDER_CODE AS "orderCode", ORDER_ITEM_CODE AS "orderItemCode", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_GROUP AS "orderItemPropGroup", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_KEY AS "orderItemPropKey", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_VALUE AS "orderItemPropValue", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_OPTION AS "orderItemPropOption", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM ORDER_ITEM_PROP WHERE ORDER_CODE = #{orderCode} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ORDER_CODE AS "orderCode", ORDER_ITEM_CODE AS "orderItemCode", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_GROUP AS "orderItemPropGroup", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_KEY AS "orderItemPropKey", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_VALUE AS "orderItemPropValue", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_OPTION AS "orderItemPropOption", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM ORDER_ITEM_PROP WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORDER_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderCode}, '%') AND ORDER_ITEM_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderItemCode}, '%') AND ORDER_ITEM_PROP_GROUP LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderItemPropGroup}, '%') AND ORDER_ITEM_PROP_KEY LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderItemPropKey}, '%') AND ORDER_ITEM_PROP_VALUE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderItemPropValue}, '%') AND ORDER_ITEM_PROP_OPTION LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderItemPropOption}, '%') AND CREATE_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{createAuthor}, '%') AND UPDATE_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{updateAuthor}, '%') AND CREATE_DATETIME > #{createDatetime} AND UPDATE_DATETIME > #{updateDatetime} ORDER BY ${theOrderByCondition} GROUP BY ${theGroupByCondition} LIMIT ${theFetchStart} , ${theFetchSize}

SELECT ORDER_CODE AS "orderCode", ORDER_ITEM_CODE AS "orderItemCode", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_GROUP AS "orderItemPropGroup", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_KEY AS "orderItemPropKey", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_VALUE AS "orderItemPropValue", ORDER_ITEM_PROP_OPTION AS "orderItemPropOption", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM ORDER_ITEM_PROP WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( ${orderCode} ) AND ( ${orderItemCode} ) AND ( ${orderItemPropGroup} ) AND ( ${orderItemPropKey} ) AND ( ${orderItemPropValue} ) AND ( ${orderItemPropOption} ) AND ( ${theSQLCondition} ) ORDER BY ${theOrderByCondition} GROUP BY ${theGroupByCondition} LIMIT ${theFetchStart} , ${theFetchSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_ITEM_PROP_HT ( OPERATION_HISTORY_DATETIME, OPERATION_HISTORY_CATEGORY, ORDER_CODE, ORDER_ITEM_CODE, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_GROUP, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_KEY, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_VALUE, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_OPTION, CREATE_AUTHOR, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_AUTHOR, UPDATE_DATETIME ) VALUES ( current_timestamp(), 'C', #{orderCode}, #{orderItemCode}, #{orderItemPropGroup}, #{orderItemPropKey}, #{orderItemPropValue}, #{orderItemPropOption}, #{createAuthor}, #{createDatetime}, #{updateAuthor}, #{updateDatetime} )

INSERT INTO ORDER_ITEM_PROP_HT ( OPERATION_HISTORY_DATETIME, OPERATION_HISTORY_CATEGORY, ORDER_CODE, ORDER_ITEM_CODE, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_GROUP, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_KEY, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_VALUE, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_OPTION, CREATE_AUTHOR, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_AUTHOR, UPDATE_DATETIME ) VALUES ( current_timestamp(), 'U', #{orderCode}, #{orderItemCode}, #{orderItemPropGroup}, #{orderItemPropKey}, #{orderItemPropValue}, #{orderItemPropOption}, #{createAuthor}, #{createDatetime}, #{updateAuthor}, #{updateDatetime} )

INSERT INTO ORDER_ITEM_PROP_HT ( OPERATION_HISTORY_DATETIME, OPERATION_HISTORY_CATEGORY, ORDER_CODE, ORDER_ITEM_CODE, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_GROUP, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_KEY, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_VALUE, ORDER_ITEM_PROP_OPTION, CREATE_AUTHOR, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_AUTHOR, UPDATE_DATETIME ) VALUES ( current_timestamp(), 'D', #{orderCode}, #{orderItemCode}, #{orderItemPropGroup}, #{orderItemPropKey}, #{orderItemPropValue}, #{orderItemPropOption}, #{createAuthor}, #{createDatetime}, #{updateAuthor}, #{updateDatetime} )
